recipe_name: Smoked eel and cream cheese mousse with griddled ciabatta
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl. Use two spoons to shape the mixture into three quenelles (rugby ball shapes). To serve, place a quenelle of smoked eel mousse on top of each slice of griddled ciabatta. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper and serve.
ingredients: 2 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  150ml/5½fl oz double cream, lightly whipped,  55g/2oz smoked eel, flaked,  1 lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  100g/3½oz cream cheese,  3 slices ciabatta, griddled ,  pinch cayenne pepper
